snippet: Former President Bill Clinton, at a fund-raiser for President Obama on Monday, said having Mitt Romney in the White House would be "calamitous for our country and the world."
abstract: Former President Bill Clinton, at a fund-raiser for President Obama on Monday, said having Mitt Romney in the White House would be "calamitous for our country and the world."

headline.main: Clinton Takes a Hard Jab at Romney
